text: I contacted the bike commute challenge people and had them remove the second "spilliams" from our list. It did not appear to affect the team standing, but at least now it's a little cleaner
Awesome.
BTW, anyone knows how that "Commute Rate" of 33.5% is being calculated?
assuming its the avg of every team members commute rate
we have a lot of team members that arent actually riding
a straight average of our rider's rates is 54.8%
i think it uses the number of employees we have entered in out team profile
I tried several formulas over the weekend and nothing added up
our number of riders is clear, but I can't find our number of employees. It could be that.
Is there one? I remember us being in a category like 12-40 or something like that but nothing specific.
for instance, total riders rates is 666.7%, divide by 18 gives me 37.0%, which is what it shows (currently) on the team stats
yes spencer's right i think
so even though we have 12 riders, BCC thinks we have 18 employees
Ohhhh
which, looking at our website, we do. although Luke is counted in that, and contractors are not
so those people signed up who haven't logged miles are not hurting us at all
haha. yeah we're kinda cheating.
It really helps our rivalry with Urban Airship though. If the rate were just riders they'd be at 55.9% (they're actually at 7.5%)
yeah even if we were including contractors in our numbers we'd still be killing them
what is the deal with the rivalries - is there any substance to that or is that just for the sake of stoking the competitive fire
my hunch is that it's the latter
